comments:
When I tried launching the runtime workbench with tracing (using the .option 
file in org.eclipse.wst.command.env. I ran into a couple of problems.

Problem #1:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.wst.command.env.context.PersistentContext.<init>
(PersistentContext.java:31)
	at 
org.eclipse.wst.command.internal.env.context.PersistentActionDialogsContext.<ini
t>(PersistentActionDialogsContext.java:26)
	at 
org.eclipse.wst.command.internal.env.context.PersistentActionDialogsContext.getI
nstance(PersistentActionDialogsContext.java:33)
	at 
org.eclipse.wst.command.internal.env.ui.widgets.popup.DynamicPopupWizard.run
(DynamicPopupWizard.java:112)

Fix #1:

In EclipseLog, ActionDialogPreferenceType, ActionDialogPreferenceTypeRegistry 
and PersistentActionDialogsContext, .option file in org.eclipse.wst.command.env

Change:

org.eclipse.wst.env

To:

org.eclipse.wst.command.env

Problem #2:

- Not logging even when trace is on.

Fix #2:

- The logging function was commented out during the renaming port since the 
Logger was not available.
- Modified EclipseLog.java to output to System.out as an interim solution.

Created an attachment (id=17655)
Patch for wst.command.env.
Changed Version field given new release numbering.
